title: Font used for ICONWerk.de logo and layout
content:
Hello everyone,  
does anyone know the name of the font used for [Iconwerk.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20091119090739/http:/www.iconwerk.de/) logo and layout titles?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091119090739im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Immagine_2_6262.png)

It’s so wonderful, so inspiring to me!

Thank you so much in advance!  
Bye
author: VisualPollution

comments.content:
what about the current one? [http://www.iconwerk.de/](http://web.archive.org/web/20091119090739/http:/www.iconwerk.de/ "http://www.iconwerk.de/") anyone knows what font is used in the logo and throughout the website?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091119090739im_/http:/typophile.com/files/iconwerk-logo_4492.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091119090739im_/http:/typophile.com/files/backbutton_5772.png)
